definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: She was exempted from paying tax.
You needs all your valuables to sell for that tax money.
sentences.chinese: 你需要變賣你所有有價值的東西去付稅金的。

sentences.english: We could assess a teensy tiny, minute tax... on every transaction.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以評價每筆交易的稅金。

sentences.english: Gold and silver coins to pay your rent, grocery bills and taxes.
sentences.chinese: 金銀可以付租金，零售交易賬單和稅金等等。

sentences.english: Sometimes you pay fewer taxes if you're self-employed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是自營商的身分有時候可以少付些稅金。

sentences.english: After taxes and insurance, there's not much left to take home.
sentences.chinese: 扣掉稅金和保險費後，剩下能帶回家的錢就不多了。

sentences.english: You’ll have to pay duty on this.
sentences.chinese: 你必須爲這項物品繳付稅金。

sentences.english: In addition, at present US firms are allowed to claim a credit against their American taxes for foreign taxes paid.
sentences.chinese: 另外，目前美國企業可以爲應繳的境外稅金申請賒欠。

sentences.english: People are afraid that taxes will soon be jacked up.
sentences.chinese: 人們擔心稅金會很快提高。

sentences.english: ou'll have to pay duty on this.
sentences.chinese: 你必須爲這項物品繳付稅金。

sentences.english: This system will use our tax money efficiently to support the arts.
sentences.chinese: 這個體系將有效地利用我們的稅金資助藝術。

sentences.english: After taxes and insurance, there's no much left to take home.
sentences.chinese: 扣掉稅金和保險費後，剩下能帶回家的就不多了。

sentences.english: What if the rent includes the government rates?
sentences.chinese: 每月租金可否包括政府稅金？

sentences.english: Please refer to the attached Statement of Account for you total outstanding tax balance.
sentences.chinese: 未支付稅金餘額請參閱所附的帳戶明細。

sentences.english: It is usual to prorate the taxes between the seller and the buyer in the sale of real estate.
sentences.chinese: 在出售房地產中，通常由買賣雙方分攤稅金。

sentences.english: Laid-up taxes of Economic&Technology Development Zone excludes data of tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 經開區入庫稅金已扣除菸草數據。

definition: to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
